### Part 1

```{r}
fish <- function(x){
  x <- c(x, rep(9, sum(x == 0)))
  x[x == 0] <- 7
  x - 1
}

accumulate(1:80, ~fish(.x), .init = lant) %>% 
  last() %>% 
  length()
  
```
